item.title: 中国在新指南中敦促企业不要使用英伟达 H20 芯片
item.description: 中国已敦促当地公司避免使用英伟达公司的 H20 处理器，尤其是用于与政府相关的用途，这使得这家芯片制造商试图挽回数十亿中国收入损失的努力以及特朗普政府史无前例地推动将这些销售转化为美国政府意外之财的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：China has urged local companies to avoid using Nvidia Corp.’s H20 processors, particularly for government-related purposes, complicating the chipmaker’s attempts to recoup billions in lost China revenue as well as the Trump administration’s unprecedented push to turn those sales into a US government windfall.】

item.title: 在与特朗普对峙之际，卢拉继莫迪、普京之后又与习近平通话
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）在与印度和俄罗斯领导人会谈后与中国总统进行了交谈，这是他在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将拉美最大的经济体推入其全球贸易战之后与盟国进行的外联活动的一部分。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva spoke with his Chinese counterpart following talks with the leaders of India and Russia, as part of his outreach to allies after Donald Trump thrust Latin America’s biggest economy into the middle of his global trade war.】

item.title: 中国 30 年期国债收益率因贸易乐观情绪升至四个月高点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）延长了与中国的关税休战期，刺激了世界两大经济体改善贸易关系的希望，中国的 30 年期国债收益率升至 4 月份以来的最高点。【原文：China’s 30-year bond yields rose to the highest since April as President Donald Trump’s extension of a tariff truce with China spurred hopes of better trade ties between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行第三次降息，将利率降至 2023 年 4 月以来最低点
item.description: 澳大利亚央行今年第三次下调了关键利率，同时表示未来的政策决定将取决于即将公布的数据。【原文：Australia’s central bank trimmed its key interest rate for a third time this year, while signaling future policy decisions will hinge on incoming data.】

item.title: 锂矿商股价重拾涨势，中国产量成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于市场对中国电池金属产量的前景进行了权衡，锂生产商的股价继周一因一个大型矿场关闭而大幅上涨之后出现下跌。【原文：Lithium producers’ shares fell — following sharp gains on Monday that were driven by the closure of a major mine closure — as the market weighed the outlook for Chinese output of the battery metal.】

item.title: 谈判陷入僵局，香港建筑商侨福寻求贷款延期
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，香港开发商侨福集团（Parkview Group Ltd.）正在寻求将周五到期的一笔 9.4 亿美元贷款延期三个月，以争取更多时间与银行谈判再融资协议。【原文：Hong Kong developer Parkview Group Ltd. is seeking a three-month extension on a $940 million loan due Friday, in a bid to get more time to negotiate a refinancing deal with banks, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 普拉博沃的食品产业主管以零预算为由辞职
item.description: 一家国有农业公司的负责人在上任六个月后辞职，称该公司没有从总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的政府那里获得任何资助，这使印度尼西亚提高粮食自给率的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：Indonesia’s push to boost food self-sufficiency suffered a setback after the head of a state-owned farming firm resigned six months into the job, saying the company hadn’t received any funding from the government of President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 特朗普延长与中国的贸易休战后大豆期货下跌
item.description: 大豆价格回落到每蒲式耳 10 美元以下，因为交易商认为，中美贸易休战延长的消息可能会将两国之间的主要谷物采购交易推迟到今年年底。【原文：Soybean prices fell back below $10 a bushel, as traders saw news of an extended US-China trade truce as likely delaying major grain-purchasing deals between the nations until late this year.】

item.title: 因避风港上诉，CBA 空头押注降至三年来最低
item.description: 受澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）"避风港 "美誉的支撑，对该股的看跌押注已跌至三年来的最低点。【原文：Bearish wagers on Commonwealth Bank of Australia have tumbled to the lowest in three years, supported by the stock’s reputation as a haven.】

item.title: 受关税影响的南非瞄准亚洲买家购买农产品
item.description: 南非正努力在亚洲和其他地区为其农产品开拓新市场，这些农产品受到了美国惩罚性进口关税的打击。【原文：South Africa is trying to open up new markets in Asia and elsewhere for its farm produce that has been hit with punitive US import tariffs.】

item.title: 绿洲》会加剧英国的通胀困境吗？绝对可能
item.description: 绿洲 "乐队的复出巡演似乎将加剧英国通胀率的回升，使已经令英格兰银行产生分歧的棘手局面变得更加复杂。【原文：The Oasis comeback tour looks set to add to a resurgence of inflation in the UK, complicating an already tricky situation that has divided the Bank of England.】

item.title: 交易商关注中国阅兵式的钢铁减产，铁矿石涨势扩大
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天上涨，原因是交易商重点关注中国政府将在下月北京阅兵式前实施钢铁减产的预期。【原文：Iron ore rose for a second day, as traders focused on expectations that the Chinese government will enforce steel production cuts ahead of next month’s military parade in Beijing.】

item.title: EA 称中国购买沙特石油力度减弱暗示贸易重新布局
item.description: 据 Energy Aspects Ltd.称，中国炼油商对沙特阿拉伯石油的需求正在减少，这一下降可能表明，随着更多俄罗斯原油的供应，全球石油流将重新洗牌。【原文：Chinese refiners are asking for less oil from Saudi Arabia, with the drop possibly pointing to a reshuffle of global flows as more Russian crude becomes available, according to Energy Aspects Ltd.】

item.title: 受美联储减息押注和美元走低影响，马来西亚债券外流将有所缓解
item.description: 据新加坡康维拉公司（Convera Singapore）称，马来西亚国内债券市场的外资流出可能会有所缓解，因为对美联储降息的预期不断增强，开始改变投资者的情绪。【原文：Foreign outflows from Malaysia’s domestic bond market may ease, according to Convera Singapore, as growing expectations of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts begin to shift investor sentiment.】

item.title: 尽管与美国达成贸易协议，韩国智囊团仍对经济增长持乐观态度
item.description: 韩国国营智库维持其对 2025 年经济增长的展望，尽管与美国在最后一刻达成的贸易协议帮助韩国躲过了惩罚性关税上调的最坏影响。【原文：South Korea’s state-run think tank maintained its growth outlook for 2025, even as a last-minute trade deal with the US helped the nation dodge the worst of a punishing tariff hikes.】

item.description: 押注美联储下月降息的债券投资者面临着一个潜在的障碍：通货膨胀。【原文：Bond investors betting on a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month face a potential roadblock: inflation.】

item.title: 马斯克指责苹果在 iPhone 应用程序中不公平地偏袒 OpenAI
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一晚些时候抨击了苹果公司应用商店的做法，指责这家 iPhone 制造商偏袒 OpenAI。【原文：Elon Musk lashed out against Apple Inc.’s app store practices late on Monday, accusing the iPhone maker of favoring OpenAI.】

item.title: 贷款违约后银行考虑查封香港万福商场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在施罗德资本（Schroders Capital）和Chelsfield亚洲基金支持的一家合资企业拖欠与香港一家购物中心相关的贷款后，银行债权人正在考虑夺取该购物中心的控制权。【原文：Bank creditors are considering seizing control of a Hong Kong shopping center after a venture backed by Schroders Capital and Chelsfield’s Asia fund defaulted on a loan tied to the property, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国需求推动香港房屋租金屡创新高
item.description: 在大批中国学生和专业人士移居香港的推动下，香港的房屋租赁市场预计将在 10 月份创下历史新高。【原文：Hong Kong’s rental housing market is expected to hit a record high by October, fueled by a wave of Chinese students and professionals moving to the city.】

item.title: 新西兰混凝土产量在经济降温中创下新低
item.description: 由于经济增长降温和全球不确定性抑制了住宅建设和新建商业建筑的投资，新西兰的混凝土产量下滑至十多年来的最低水平。【原文：New Zealand’s concrete production slipped to the lowest level in more than 10 years as cooling economic growth and global uncertainty curb home construction and investment in new commercial buildings.】

item.title: 中国铜制造商不太可能成为特朗普关税的赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）努力提高美国的铜产量，中国最大的铜加工企业之一将从中获得意外之财。【原文：One of China’s biggest copper fabricators is set to reap a windfall from President Donald Trump’s efforts to boost US production of the metal.】

item.title: 全球贸易前景改善，日本日经指数创历史新高
item.description: 由于对全球贸易的乐观情绪提振了这一蓝筹股指数，日本日经 225 指数周二创下历史新高。【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average hit an all-time high on Tuesday as optimism over global trade boosted the blue-chip gauge.】

item.title: 新加坡上调 2025 年经济增长预期，但警告未来存在风险
item.description: 新加坡上调了今年的经济增长预期，因为上半年的经济表现好于预期，主要原因是在美国征收关税之前的前置性投资，以及贸易紧张局势的缓解。【原文：Singapore raised its growth forecast for this year after a better-than-expected performance in the first half, mainly on the back of front-loading ahead of US tariffs, and easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 交易员寻求澄清特朗普的无关税誓言，黄金收跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，进口金银不会被征收美国关税，尽管交易商仍在等待该政策的正式澄清，但上周的联邦裁决给整个市场带来了混乱和困惑。【原文：Gold held a loss after President Donald Trump said imports of bullion won’t be subject to US tariffs, although traders were still waiting for formal clarification over the policy following a federal ruling last week that sowed chaos and confusion across the market.】

item.title: 特朗普延长对华期限，石油价格维持在两个月低点附近
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普延长了对中国征收天价关税的暂停期，稳定了世界两大经济体之间的贸易关系，此后，石油价格变化不大。【原文：Oil was little changed after President Donald Trump extended a pause of sky-high tariffs on China, stabilizing trade ties between the world’s two biggest economies.】
